mapper.select: select tsm.id as menu_id, tsm.pid as menu_pid, tsm.menu_name, tsm.menu_url, tsm.description, tsm.menu_level from t_sys_menu tsm left join t_sys_role_menu_ref tsrmr on tsm.id = tsrmr.menu_id left join t_sys_user_role_ref tsurr on tsurr.role_id = tsrmr.role_id left join t_sys_user tsu on tsu.id = tsurr.user_id where tsu.id = #{userId};
